cta.text: BUY ONE, GET ONE FREE TODAY!

promptVars.product: a supplement bottle with a bright pink label that reads HAIR, SKIN AND NAILS GUMMY, white cap, brand name covered by a black rectangle
promptVars.subject: a 55-65 year old woman with gray shoulder-length hair, friendly smile
promptVars.scene: indoors at home, natural daylight, casual smartphone photo
promptVars.extra: Hold the bottle close to the camera in one hand with the label facing the camera. Shallow depth of field. Realistic skin texture.

comment.text: People ask me all the time if i got extensions, this stuff is the REAL DEAL!!! insane.
